articles.author: Lawrence Bonk
articles.title: Labor Day sale discounts a four-pack of AirTags to $75
articles.description:
The Labor Day discounts continue to roll in. You can scoop up a four-pack of Apple AirTags for just $75 via Amazon
. That’s a drop of around 25 percent, as the typical cost is $99. It also breaks down to $18 per AirTag, which is a great deal and much cheaper…

articles.author: Justin Pot
articles.title: Turn Your Old iPhone or iPad Into a Retro Game Machine
articles.description: Free emulator software can give an old device new life as a classic video game system. For bonus points, hook up a controller and stream games to your TV.
articles.content:
Do you have an iPhone and a desire to play retro video games? I have good news for you.

articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.title: AnandTech shuts down after 27 years
articles.description: Influential tech hardware site AnandTech, known for its in-depth reviews and analysis, has announced that it’s shutting down after 27 years.
articles.content:
